testimonials.subject: The ARIA team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
testimonials.desc: I am New York City resident.   I want to thank Aria Diagnostic for their kindness and passion to help us in New York City.  I am so grateful and God bless.  Be safe.
testimonials.name: Evelyn Diaz

testimonials.subject: The ARIA team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
testimonials.desc: Very thorough with testing for COVID and staff is great! Thank you for everything you guys are doing!
testimonials.name: Richard Miller

testimonials.subject: The ARIA team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
testimonials.desc: I cannot fully express my appreciation and gratitude for Aria Diagnostics regarding the care and assistance I received in seeking COVID-19 testing for my 91 year-old mother.  I sent a note requesting assistance using their web interface, not really expecting much of a response.  I received an almost immediate response
testimonials.name: Deborah Dahlke
